title: I can't send chat messages
body: I was in game and someone and might have hit my keyboard and I can't send chat in champ select and can't type at all in game

replies.body:
That's definitely odd. Your key bindings might have changed so that enter isn't popping up the chat box anymore, so let's try resetting your config files to get that situated again. 

- Log into the game client
- Navigate to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\Config
- Delete the file  named **game.cfg** and **persistedsettings.json**
- Go into a custom game and verify that settings have saved properly. 
- Leave game to sync settings

Let me know if that helps or not!
